title: Amplion Tapped by Saint Marys Regional Medical Center to Deliver Nurse Call, Advanced Patient Care Communications
text:
Capella Healthcare Hospital Establishes Leadership Position in Nurse Call, Patient Communication and Patient Experience Through Amplion Partnership
Nashville, TN (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Amplion Clinical Communications today announced that Saint Mary’s Regional Medical Center, a Capella Healthcare Hospital, has selected Amplion Alert to enhance its nurse call system and patient care communication capabilities.
Amplion Alert is a first-of-its-kind, patient care assurance platform that aims to reduce costs, optimize clinical workflows and improve inpatient health outcomes and satisfaction. Specifically engineered to fuel next level patient care, Amplion Alert tracks care events at the patient's bedside in real time, facilitates efficient clinical response and confirms that care was delivered.
“The Saint Mary’s team has great vision and is a leader in the way they communicate with, and care for, their patients,” said Amplion CEO, David Condra. “We are honored they are trusting us as partners as they raise expectations for what’s possible in patient communication and patient experience.”
Saint Mary’s will be activating the full capabilities of Amplion Alert, including advanced nurse call features, a suite of specialized messaging and reminder tools and alarm management. This in-room technology will help Saint Mary’s caregivers triage alarms, nurse call requests and other patient needs, while collecting real-time data that offers unparalleled views of workflow, staff performance and patient room activity.
“We are excited about the role Amplion’s unified system will play as we build on our track record of high-quality patient care,” said Mike McCoy, interim CEO/COO for Saint Mary’s. “Amplion Alert will allow us to streamline workflow while accessing powerful clinical data that will help evaluate the care we are delivering. This is the future of smarter healthcare.”
About Saint Mary’s Regional Medical Center
Saint Mary’s Regional Medical Center has been serving the Arkansas River Valley for more than 85 years. Saint Mary’s has continued to grow, expand and add new services to meet the needs of the growing market and communities they serve in order to deliver the most comprehensive healthcare possible. For more information: http://www.saintmarysregional.com/
About Capella Healthcare
Capella Healthcare partners with communities to build strong local healthcare systems that are known for quality patient care. Based in Franklin, Tennessee, Capella owns and/or operates acute care and specialty hospital facilities in six states. For more information: http://www.capellahealth.com
About Amplion
Amplion is building a better future for patient care. We combine capabilities in clinical workflow optimization, advanced patient communications technology and in-depth analytics to help organizations make data-driven decisions and create accountability within clinical teams. We close care loops and dramatically improve clinical and financial performance as well as patient and clinician experience. Safer patients. Smarter care. Assured. Learn more at http://www.amplionalert.com
